Gallery.Name: Mind Map
Gallery.Description: Create mind maps (graphical representations of thought processes) for brainstorming, problem solving, rational analysis, and decision marking.

Template.Name: Radial Map
Template.Description: Create mind maps to represent ideas and concepts.

Template.Name: Right Map
Template.Description: Create mind maps with right hierarchical layout.

Template.Name: Tree Map
Template.Description: Tree map is ideal for displaying large amounts of hierarchically structured information.

Template.Name: Org-Chart Map
Template.Description: Organizational chart shows the structure of an organization and the relationships and relative ranks of its parts and positions.

Template.Name: Concept Map
Template.Description: Concept map uses to organize and structure knowledge.
